did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: The Town of Redding Collection is a small collection containing historical information about the Town of Redding.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the G&B Cultural Center.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Item Description, Date], Town of Redding Collection, [Item no., Box no.], G&B Cultural Center, Wilton, Conn.

bioghist.head: History
bioghist.p: The neighborhood of Georgetown is located partially within the Town of Redding, Conn. Redding was incorporated as a town in 1767.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: The Town of Redding Collection includes annual reports of the Town of Redding, historical information on Redding residents during the colonial period, postcards and photographs of Redding landmarks, zoning information, and a selection of local publications and periodicals on the topic of Redding history.

controlaccess.p: The following terms have been used to index the description of this collection in the library's online public access catalog.
